business_strategies.implementation: Either be the content creator or partner with one for distribution

startup_ideas.idea: Neighborhood village development as a business
startup_ideas.target_market: Groups of friends wanting to live in community
startup_ideas.problem_solved: Lack of intentional community in traditional housing
startup_ideas.business_model: Mini-developer taking over blocks, running as nonprofit-style with dues
startup_ideas.validation: Viral tweet engagement, real examples in Austin and San Francisco
startup_ideas.investment_needed: significant capital for real estate acquisition

startup_ideas.business_model: Acquire dormant profitable apps and improve them

mistakes_to_avoid.prevention: Let people curate their own communities rather than having companies do it
mistakes_to_avoid.example: WeLive vs friends taking over apartment floors themselves

steps: Create content in lifestyle, health, fitness, making money, or productivity
